mapper.sql: id, record_id, app_id, content, send_status, report_status, mobile, msgid, channel_id, sender_time, create_time, update_time
mapper.insert: insert into t_sms_record_detail (id, record_id, app_id, content, send_status, report_status, mobile, msgid, channel_id, sender_time, create_time, update_time) values (#{id}, #{recordId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sendStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{reportStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{msgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{channelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{senderTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

id,
record_id,
app_id,
content,
send_status,
report_status,
mobile,
msgid,
channel_id,
sender_time,
create_time,

mapper.update:
update t_sms_record_detail
record_id = #{recordId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
app_id = #{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
send_status = #{sendStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT},
report_status = #{reportStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT},
mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
msgid = #{msgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
channel_id = #{channelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sender_time = #{senderTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update t_sms_record_detail set record_id = #{recordId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, app_id = #{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, send_status = #{sendStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, report_status = #{reportStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, msgid = #{msgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, channel_id = #{channelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sender_time = #{senderTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select
from t_sms_record_detail t
and mobile like CONCAT('%', #{mobile}, '%')
order by t.create_time desc LIMIT #{start}, #{end}

select count(1) from t_sms_record_detail t
mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
